metadata.title: CVE-2021-20810 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Cross-site scripting vulnerability in Website Management screen of MovableType (Movable Type 7 r.4903 and earlier (Movable Type 7 Series), MovableType 6.8.0 and earlier (Movable Type 6 Series), Movable Type Advanced 7r.4903 and earlier (Movable Type Advanced 7 Series), Movable Type Premium1.44 and earlier, and Movable Type Premium Advanced 1.44 and earlier)allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary script or HTML via unspecifiedvectors.

criterions.comment: movabletype-opensource: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
